article: u.s. president george w. bush told a skeptical arab world on wednesday that the actions of soldiers who mistreated iraqi prisoners `` do n't represent america '' and pledged that `` justice will be served .
abstract: bush addresses skeptical arab world to limit damage from prisoner-abuse scandal
